title: Drawing, "Mother and Child eating Ice Cream Cones", 1941
medium: Pen and white ink on black paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and white ink: World's Fair.
description: Mother and child in summer clothes, profile, each eating ice cream cone. Design in white against black background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mother and Child eating Ice Cream Cones", 1941.
1941. Pen and white ink on black paper. Gift of Christina Malman. 1947-110-21.
